website_summaries.verdict: Hand-painted, high-quality porcelain topper with fine details and a romantic design
pros: Available in light, medium, and dark skin tones
cons: It's quite delicate and may chip easily

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and unique wedding topper.
customer_reviews.text: Our topper arrived in good condition except it had a couple weird black drops or splatters on the gown of the bride. A little water and a paper towel removed it easily so based on how well made it was and how much of a hit it was at our wedding, it gets to keep a five star rating. Everyone thought it was super cute and it worked well for us. One small thing of note, we thought the bride had dirty blonde hair in the pic but its definitely brown in person. It didn't bother us much but may be a deal breaker for some bridezillas.
customer_reviews.author: Jconner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful topper, great match for my style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my wedding cake. Best topper that I feel captured my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love this wedding topper
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our daughter's wedding , it was on her Amazon registry. One of their favorite engagement photos was with a frame around their face so this was nice. A warning open and check it first, It is fragile and first one received had to be returned because a small piece was broken but second one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: California housewife

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as the cake topper for my upcoming wedding. The piece looks just as pictured and I am very happy I chose this one as it really represents us. Do not be alarmed when you open the box and do not see the frame - as it comes tucked underneath the figurine for protection; it just slides right on. =)
customer_reviews.author: Romi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! It's adorable and I'm so happy I went with this cake-topper. The picture frame is removable so you can orient the frame any way you chose (as pictured, tall, or askew). We received many compliments from our guests on how cute and unique this topper was.
customer_reviews.author: BCL

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my fiance chose this cake topper before we went to our cake tasting. Our baker gave us the measurement for the top tier and this topper will fit perfectly on top! It's the perfect size for our 3 tier wedding cake and I think reflects us since we are always traveling and taking pics!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought the figurine for my June wedding I love it I can't wait to see it on top of my cake. I was suorised the fram was seperate but sets into place easily. It was smaller then I expected but the quality of this piece makes you over look that.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our wedding cake! <3
customer_reviews.text: Used this as our wedding cake topper! Everyone loved it!!!! So did we!
customer_reviews.author: Tashany99

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take so many selfies it's definitely a problem. The solution, get this cake topper for our wedding proving we aren't the only one's who do it and there's actually a market for people like us. It's solid, actually pretty heavy. Six stars because whatadeal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Picture Perfect" cake topper
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! I was a little skeptical at first when buying this, I wanted a cake topper that was PERFECT for my wedding cake. Was it gonna be too small, too big, too heavy, too light? When I got it in the mail, and opened it, It literally almost brought a tear to my eye! It was not too light, definetly had some weight, no where near enough to bring down a cake so dont worry, but it wont blow off if you're having an out door wedding or event, it looks EXACTLY like the picture, the frame is removable, my whole family LOVES it! I couldnt have madea better decision!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Wedding
customer_reviews.text: The picture perfect couple was a beautiful addition set on a platter with an 18 layer Norwegian Wedding cake. My husband is a photographer and we copied the pose with a frame.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is so cute! It arrived on time and looked great on the cake. It was perfect for the wedding couple as they are always taking pictures of each other. We left the frame in gold and I had pictures of the wedding couple in small gold frames around the cake. We received a lot of great comments on our cake table and the cake topper made it perfect. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danalee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved this little cake topper at my wedding. It's one of my favorite keepsakes from my wedding and I hope to pass it on to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ortiz Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a magnificent addition to our Wedding Cake. I had a great experience shopping from this company. And I didn't knew it was ceramic.
customer_reviews.author: Hu Bra

customer_reviews.title: Picture not so perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece but arrived without the most important part.. the picture frame was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: This looks like us!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like me and my hubby. I painted an ivory yarmulke on the groom with acrylic paint for a finishing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Winnick

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Our guest all commented on how different and original our cake topper was. We were thrilled with it when it arrived, during and still.
customer_reviews.author: twigmeister

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt have had a better wedding topper for our wedding! I loved it and still do. Glad I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I wanted and was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lucky13

customer_reviews.title: Cutest cake topper
customer_reviews.text: I saw this cake topper a few months ago and just knew it was the one I wanted. I am always hesitant to order things online being that it is harder to return them. When i got the cake topper it was perfect. I could not have asked for anything better. I love it and I cant wait to see it on top of our cake in June.
customer_reviews.author: AmyBrook

customer_reviews.title: Excelen!
customer_reviews.text: i bougth this to my marriage so im very happy about it. It came in a very good time and it has a very good quality. I really recomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tatan!

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn't do it justice!
customer_reviews.text: it's perfect size and weight even on small cakes. not to mention the quality, it's just perfect... the picture doesn't do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Fxtbornottb

customer_reviews.title: picture perfect transaction for a picture perfect topper!
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is gorgeous! It arrived very quickly, it was well packaged and in brand new perfect condition. The detail on it is beautiful and its a great size for my (4-tier) wedding cake. I would recommend this cake topper and this seller to everyone! they're professional, have great prices and quick shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillianna Rose

customer_reviews.title: SOO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is so cute. I couldn't believe how amazing it looked in person. A perfect size for a three or four tier cake. Can't wait to use it for my November wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this and cannot wait to use it in my wedding. I was a little disappointed because some of the paint is missing from the frame and I'm hoping it won't show in cake pictures
customer_reviews.author: Ashley wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and unique cake topper.
customer_reviews.text: A bit unconventional and quirky. Loved this on top of my daughter and son in laws cake which was a three tier ivory cake with lace detail,
customer_reviews.author: Mamadof3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It was so us and perfect for our wedding cake! It arrived super fast and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for the beautiful cake topper! My fiancee and I are always snapping pictures of friends, family and of ourselves using the one handed trick! When we saw the cake topper we knew it was us! I can't wait to share it with everyone on our wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cake Topper!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this topper and it is adorable. It is exactly what I was looking for---very cute and different than other toppers I have seen. It also is one of the few toppers that features a brunette bride!
customer_reviews.author: T. Nestleroad

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I cut out a real photo of the bride and groom and put it in the frame and it turned out terrific! Personalized toppers are very pricey and this one was beautiful and very reasonable! Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: susan tucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for our daughters wedding. Was really nice. good sized and packed safely in a box in styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Lowerjumper

customer_reviews.title: Cute Wedding Topper
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute wedding topper! We are doing a photography theme so I was thrilled to find this cake topper! I love that the picture frame comes out of their hands. I'm planning on spray painting it to match our wedding colors (gold just won't work for me)!
customer_reviews.author: bride2be

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The figurine is sooooo pretty and can't wait to see this on the top of my cake
customer_reviews.author: cocobug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute cake topper. Exactly what I was looking for. The picture is separate and slides into the hands of the man and woman which is awesome! I painted the frame silver to match my wedding colors! I am sure this will look beautiful on top of my cake in February!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My Fiance and I could not find a topper that fit us as a couple. Everything was either too cheesy or too silly. This arrived just like pictured, it's porcelain and great quality! We are so excited to use it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Santibanez

customer_reviews.title: The item was awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item, I was impressed by the packaging and the quality of the item. Everyone at the wedding loved the topper!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wedding cake figurine
customer_reviews.text: The 'picture perfect couple figurine' arrived very quickly, and in perfect order (great as I live in New Zealand). The figurine is just as I expected, and I'm very happy with my purchase. Using on my wedding cake in August! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T - NZ

customer_reviews.title: So very perfect for us since we are into photos and pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: So very perfect for us since we are into photos and pictures of our trips. The product is of high quality and delivered ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect top to our day
customer_reviews.text: The frame is removable and well packed. We were able to change the color of the frame to fit our wedding and it was perfect with our cake.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Getting married soon, found this on amazon and looks just as good in person. Only flaw is you have to glue the frame to their hands. Other than that awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Abouelfadl

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cake topper Great detail, good size, good price and it arrived on time I would recommend this merchant
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T

customer_reviews.title: so adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This topper is so cute! It definitely seems like the perfect weight, not too heavy and not too light.I can't wait to see it on my cake!
customer_reviews.author: Kelseyb

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with our adorable cake topper. Good quality and well packaged. It is going to look great on our big day!
customer_reviews.author: Library_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect is Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice size. It is exactly as described. Much better quality than others that I have seen in local bridal stores.
customer_reviews.author: ldmc105

customer_reviews.title: Better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my wedding and I'm very happy. The figurine is very original and better than the picture. They were also really quick with the delivery and the conditions were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is so adorable!! I love it!! Can't wait to see it on our cake in December! Cute and sturdy!! Shipped very quickly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is a very accurate depiction of the product, and I cannot wait to see it on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: SarahBert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We all thought it was different and we all loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylene Lingesso

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: Love this cake topper. I used it for our 25th Anniversary reception. Had some many great comments. Glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: feliciac601

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture, it comes in a very protective box and it goes on top of the cake like it should. Not much else to say about a cake topper
customer_reviews.author: andrew wagle

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: good size and has a removeable frame that can be painted and replaced. Needs a base so it won't sit directly on cake. Base will give it more height.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: product was delivered late and seller did not give tracking information until after the product had been delivered. make sure you buy with plenty of time before the wedding. i wouldn't want a bride to be stressing out over the cake topper!! (i ordered mine about 2 months in advance). product was exactly as expected..cute!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Buyer2012

customer_reviews.title: topper
customer_reviews.text: The frame was different than what I expected. Overall nice cake topper and product. Will do business with again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Davis

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our wedding! I still have it on our shelf! Beautiful design!
customer_reviews.author: Lahela

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks better than the picture, I was a little iffy buying it but I'm very satisfied with it. The only reason why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the picture frame is separate, it comes with it but it isn't actually held on by anything at all which I thought was pretty odd but the hands kind of hold it up. With a little super glue this was worth the money. The same exact one on davids bridal was $40.00. I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting to save some money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wedding cake, smaller than i thought it would be good thing im having a cupcake wedding cake. Another thing the picture frame is placed in their hands and not attached. Its a like unsteady and crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Hope D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This piece was perfect for my son and Daughter-in-law. My son is a photographer by trade.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Firestine

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews on Amazon before purchasing my cake topper. It is really cute! I glued the frame in place so as not to get lost as some suggested. I'm also going to grey the hair a little since this is a very "mature" wedding. Because we liked the topper so much, we also had wine labels made with us looking through a frame! We will be married soon and I know everyone will love it as much as we do. Just wish I looked like the bride.
customer_reviews.author: aunt maggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about purchasing this because of bad reviews. But it was perfect :) nothing broken when I got it and the frame sits where it's supposed to. I can't wait to see it on the wedding cake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Valorie
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this item but be warned. Order EARLY because this took a very long time to get to me. It was back ordered and ended up taking like 3 or more weeks to get. But the price was great and the quality is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: is a classy, beautiful and nice figurine, the faces and expressions are good, not perfect but fair enough, recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Had this for the top of our wedding cake. Didnt want the traditional thing. It came packaged great. simply adorable. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: gabriela

customer_reviews.title: So happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly how it looks!! So happy with it. Has a good weight to it. Yes, the frame is separate, but that is fine. It is so cute!! Teresa
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Topper
customer_reviews.text: This topper is adorable, in great shape and looks wonderful on top of a wedding cake. It's also very clever and we used it on ours.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Wheel

customer_reviews.title: Our quirky Cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: We are a black couple and purchased this cake topper. LOL!!! We loove it! Its so quirky . We had a black tie wedding and reception, but we wanted elements of fun in our reception and this was it. WE placed it on a four tier cake and it did not get devoured. It is the cutest cake topper ever, and our guests loved it. !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Etta

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful juat a hair to small but we will recommend this to any to buy for a small wedding
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: this is so adorable. the only thing i dont like is that the picture frame just kind of sits on there. so should it get bumped id be afraid it would fall off. but it is super cute
customer_reviews.author: getmeouttahere

customer_reviews.title: Fun and perfect topper!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for our special day! Well made with a lot of detail! It will make a fun topper to our wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Semik

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful, only issue was that there is a spot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, only issue was that there is a spot by the frame on the mans tuxedo it's white I just didn't like the way it looked. But very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what we were looking for. Can't wait to see it on our wedding cake! It looks great in person.
customer_reviews.author: shopshopshop

customer_reviews.title: cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: it's porcelain and hand painted and the quality is good. plus it looks really cute. the colors are good and it doesn't look cheesy or silly in any way, which many of the cake toppers I have seen do. I can't wait to use it on our cake!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Watchett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The delivery toke more than expected but once I opened the box, I was very pleased! Its a beautiful cake topper with amazing details! It made me really happy, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom-to-be

customer_reviews.title: I really love it.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase of this product. It arrived faster than we thought. We are so looking forward to having it on our daughter's wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: michell hebel

customer_reviews.title: I ' this topper
customer_reviews.text: This topper is going to be displayed in my house until my fiance and I are two little wrinkled up white haired people. Such a sweet classic topper with a twist :)
customer_reviews.author: MM Taylor

product_meta.title: Weddingstar Picture Perfect Couple Figurine
product_meta.description: Poised for a "Picture Perfect" portrait, this sweet couple will complement almost any cake design or color theme. Hand painted porcelain. The Couple is 141/4 cm Tall Presently the Bride and Groom Cake Toppers are available with skin tones and hair colors only as shown.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
